director.name: 杰西卡·莎拉·林兰 Jessica Sarah Rinland

this_title: Jessica Sarah Rinland to Chick Strand
trans_title: 杰西卡·莎拉·林兰致奇克·斯特兰德
introduction: The Punto de Vista film festival invited a series of contemporary directors to make short film-letters, addressed to other directors they admired but had never met in person. Among others, Lynne Sachs wrote to Jean Vigo, Nicolás Pereda paid homage to Chantal Akerman and Alejo Moguillansky greeted Antonioni. Because cinema is also a way of connecting, getting to know each other and falling in love.
chinese_title: 杰西卡·莎拉·林兰致奇克·斯特兰德
foreign_title: Jessica Sarah Rinland to Chick Strand
